request.description: This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to localhost/api/recipes/search to search for recipes based on the provided query parameter. The query parameter "query" is used to specify the search term. The response of this request is documented as a JSON schema.

body.raw:
{"title":"White rice","description":"This is a white rice plate that is perfect for when we're in a rush, but still want a delicious plate.","ingredients":"1 cup of rice
1 cup of water
1 cup of peas
1 carrot
1 garlic
Salt
Vegetable oil
1/4 onion","instructions":"Cut the carrot in small pieces
Heat a pan with oil
heat the onion and the garlic until brown
Heat the rice with water in the microwave for 1 minute
Filter the water and rice
Add the rice to the heated pan and let it there until it's brown
mix it
once brown, add water until all rice is covered
add the carrot and the peas
add salt
leave it there boiling until the rice is visible and the water is consumed","categories":"Mexican, Low Carb"}

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Mexican spaghetti",
    "description": "This a mexican spaghetti version that adds the real mexican flavor.",
    "ingredients": "1 package spaghetti
3 tomatoes
1/2 onion
Water
1 Garlic
Salt
Sour cream",
    "instructions": "Put water to boil with salt
Put the spaghetti after the water boils for 10 minutes
Put the tomatoes, water, sour cream in the blender
Pour the mix in the pan with the spaghetti",
    "categories": "Mexican, Italian, Low Carb"
}
